languages.text: When creature's wounds drops to 5% of it's origin or lower, it becomes ferocious: greatly increases it's STR, WS, AGI. Creature interrupts attacker's turn interrupts and runs to it's last attacker, ignoring enemie's AoO and dies after it's final strike.

traits.locale_text: When creature's wounds drops to 5% of it's origin or lower, it becomes ferocious: greatly increases it's STR, WS, AGI. Creature interrupts attacker's turn interrupts and runs to it's last attacker, ignoring enemie's AoO and dies after it's final strike.

languages.text: Once this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 5% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, it immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, runs to its last attacker, and attacks them. During that extra turn, this creature ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} are significantly increased, all {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are removed from it, and its wounds cannot be reduced to 0. After performing this final attack, the creature immediately dies. This effect is not triggered if the creature takes a single instance of damage equal to or more than twice its current wounds.
languages.original_text: Как только количество ран этого существа опускается ниже 5% от его максимального количества, оно немедленно получает дополнительный ход, бежит к последнему нападавшему и атакует его. Во время этого дополнительного хода существо игнорирует атаки возможности, его Ловкость, Сила и Оружейное мастерство значительно увеличиваются, с него снимаются все негативные эффекты, а его раны не могут быть уменьшены до 0. После выполнения последней атаки это существо немедленно умирает.

traits.locale_text: Once this creature's wounds drop below 5% of its maximum wounds, it immediately gains an extra turn, runs to its last attacker, and attacks them. During that extra turn, this creature ignores attacks of opportunity, its Agility, Strength, and Weapon Skill are significantly increased, all negative effects are removed from it, and its wounds cannot be reduced to 0. After performing that final attack, this creature immediately dies. This effect is not triggered, if this creature instantly takes damage equal to or more than twice its current wounds.

Once this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 5% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, it immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, runs to its last attacker, and attacks them. During that extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} are significantly increased, all {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are removed from it, and its wounds cannot be reduced to 0. After performing this final attack, the creature immediately dies. This effect is not triggered if the creature takes a single instance of damage equal to or more than twice its current wounds.

Once this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 5% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, it immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, runs to its last attacker, and attacks them. During that extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} are significantly increased, all {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are removed from it, and its wounds cannot be reduced to 0. After performing this final attack, the creature immediately dies. This effect is not triggered if the creature takes a single instance of damage equal to or more than twice its current wounds.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} этого существа опускается ниже 5% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального{/g}, оно немедленно получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, бросается к тому, кто последним его атаковал, и наносит удар. Во время этого хода существо игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} значительно увеличиваются, все {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативные эффекты{/g} снимаются, а здоровье нельзя опустить до 0. Совершив эту атаку, существо немедленно погибает. Эффект не срабатывает, если за один раз существо получает урон, превышающий его текущее здоровье вдвое или больше.
languages.original_text: Once this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 5% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, it immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, runs to its last attacker, and attacks them. During that extra turn, this creature ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} are significantly increased, all {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are removed from it, and its wounds cannot be reduced to 0. After performing this final attack, the creature immediately dies. This effect is not triggered if the creature takes a single instance of damage equal to or more than twice its current wounds.

traits.locale_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} этого существа опускается ниже 5% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального{/g}, оно немедленно получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, бросается к тому, кто последним его атаковал, и наносит удар. Во время этого хода существо игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} значительно увеличиваются, все {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативные эффекты{/g} снимаются, а здоровье нельзя опустить до 0.{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g} Совершив эту атаку, существо немедленно погибает. Эффект не срабатывает, если за один раз существо получает урон, превышающий его текущее здоровье вдвое или больше.

Когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} этого существа опускается ниже 5% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального{/g}, оно немедленно получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, бросается к тому, кто последним его атаковал, и наносит удар. Во время этого хода существо игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} значительно увеличиваются, все {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативные эффекты{/g} снимаются, а здоровье нельзя опустить до 0.{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g} Совершив эту атаку, существо немедленно погибает. Эффект не срабатывает, если за один раз существо получает урон, превышающий его текущее здоровье вдвое или больше.

languages.text: Sinken die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} dieser Kreatur unter 5 % ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g}, erhält sie sofort einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} und stürzt sich auf ihren letzten Angreifer. Während dieses Zusatzzuges ignoriert diese Kreatur {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g}. Außerdem werden ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} deutlich erhöht. Alle {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekte{/g} werden entfernt und ihre Wunden können nicht auf 0 reduziert werden. Nach diesem letzten Angriff stirbt die Kreatur auf der Stelle. Dieser Effekt wird nicht ausgelöst, wenn die Kreatur einen Schaden erleidet, der mindestens der doppelten Anzahl ihrer aktuellen Wunden entspricht.
languages.original_text: Once this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 5% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, it immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, runs to its last attacker, and attacks them. During that extra turn, this creature ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} are significantly increased, all {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are removed from it, and its wounds cannot be reduced to 0. After performing this final attack, the creature immediately dies. This effect is not triggered if the creature takes a single instance of damage equal to or more than twice its current wounds.

traits.locale_text: Sinken die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} dieser Kreatur unter 5 % ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g}, erhält sie sofort einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} und stürzt sich auf ihren letzten Angreifer. Während dieses {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zusatzzuges{/g} ignoriert diese Kreatur {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g}. Außerdem werden ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} deutlich erhöht. Alle {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekte{/g} werden entfernt und ihre Wunden können nicht auf 0 reduziert werden. Nach diesem letzten Angriff stirbt die Kreatur auf der Stelle. Dieser Effekt wird nicht ausgelöst, wenn die Kreatur einen Schaden erleidet, der mindestens der doppelten Anzahl ihrer aktuellen Wunden entspricht.

languages.text: Lorsque la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de cette créature tombe en dessous de 5 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}, elle gagne immédiatement un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g}, fonce vers son dernier assaillant et l'attaque. Pendant ce tour supplémentaire, elle ignore les {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}, son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} augmentent considérablement, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g} dont elle souffre sont supprimés et sa réserve de blessures ne peut pas être réduite à 0. Après avoir effectué cette dernière attaque, la créature meurt sur le coup. Cet effet ne se déclenche pas si la créature subit en une seule fois des dégâts égaux ou supérieurs au double de ses blessures actuelles.
languages.original_text: Once this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 5% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, it immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, runs to its last attacker, and attacks them. During that extra turn, this creature ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} are significantly increased, all {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are removed from it, and its wounds cannot be reduced to 0. After performing this final attack, the creature immediately dies. This effect is not triggered if the creature takes a single instance of damage equal to or more than twice its current wounds.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de cette créature tombe en dessous de 5 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}, elle gagne immédiatement un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g}, fonce vers son dernier assaillant et l'attaque. Pendant ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire, elle ignore les {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}, son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} augmentent considérablement, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g} dont elle souffre sont supprimés et sa réserve de blessures ne peut pas être réduite à 0. Après avoir effectué cette dernière attaque, la créature meurt sur le coup. Cet effet ne se déclenche pas si la créature subit en une seule fois des dégâts égaux ou supérieurs au double de ses blessures actuelles.

languages.text: 当此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}5%时，会立刻获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，冲向最后攻击过此生物的角色，对其进行攻击。额外回合期间，此生物不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}明显提高，移除所有{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}，且生命值不会降为0。亡命一搏结束后，此生物会立刻死亡。 如果此生物受到的单次伤害不低于当前生命值的两倍，则不会触发此效果。
languages.original_text: Once this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 5% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, it immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, runs to its last attacker, and attacks them. During that extra turn, this creature ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} are significantly increased, all {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are removed from it, and its wounds cannot be reduced to 0. After performing this final attack, the creature immediately dies. This effect is not triggered if the creature takes a single instance of damage equal to or more than twice its current wounds.

traits.locale_text: 当此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}5%时，会立刻获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，冲向最后攻击过此生物的角色，对其进行攻击。额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}期间，此生物不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}明显提高，移除所有{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}，且生命值不会降为0。亡命一搏结束后，此生物会立刻死亡。 如果此生物受到的单次伤害不低于当前生命值的两倍，则不会触发此效果。
当此生物的生命值低于最大生命值5%时，会立刻获得一个额外回合，冲向最后攻击过此生物的角色，对其进行攻击。额外回合期间，此生物不会触发借机攻击，力量、敏捷、武器技能明显提高，移除所有负面效果，且生命值不会降为0。亡命一搏结束后，此生物会立刻死亡。

languages.text: Cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de esta criatura bajan del 5 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}, inmediatamente recibe un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g}, corre hasta su último atacante y le ataca. Durante este turno extra, la criatura ignora los {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}, su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} aumentan drásticamente, pierde todos los {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g} y sus heridas no pueden bajar a 0. Tras lanzar este último ataque, la criatura muere en el acto. Este efecto no se activa si la criatura sufre una única instancia de daño igual o superior al doble de sus heridas actuales.
languages.original_text: Once this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 5% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, it immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, runs to its last attacker, and attacks them. During that extra turn, this creature ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} are significantly increased, all {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are removed from it, and its wounds cannot be reduced to 0. After performing this final attack, the creature immediately dies. This effect is not triggered if the creature takes a single instance of damage equal to or more than twice its current wounds.

traits.locale_text: Cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de esta criatura bajan del 5 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}, inmediatamente recibe un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g}, corre hasta su último atacante y le ataca. Durante este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno extra{/g}, la criatura ignora los {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}, su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} aumentan drásticamente, pierde todos los {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g} y sus heridas no pueden bajar a 0. Tras lanzar este último ataque, la criatura muere en el acto. Este efecto no se activa si la criatura sufre una única instancia de daño igual o superior al doble de sus heridas actuales.

languages.text: このクリーチャーの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}の5%を下回ると、即座に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を付与され、最後に自分を攻撃した相手に向かって走り、攻撃する。この追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、このクリーチャーは{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を無視し、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、および{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}が著しく上昇し、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}が取り除かれ、傷が0に低下しなくなる。最後の攻撃を行った後、このクリーチャーは即座に死亡する。 この効果は、現在の傷の2倍以上のダメージを単発で受けた場合には発動しない。
languages.original_text: Once this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 5% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, it immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, runs to its last attacker, and attacks them. During that extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} are significantly increased, all {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are removed from it, and its wounds cannot be reduced to 0. After performing this final attack, the creature immediately dies. This effect is not triggered if the creature takes a single instance of damage equal to or more than twice its current wounds.

traits.locale_text: このクリーチャーの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}の5%を下回ると、即座に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を付与され、最後に自分を攻撃した相手に向かって走り、攻撃する。この追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、このクリーチャーは{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を無視し、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、および{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}が著しく上昇し、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}が取り除かれ、傷が0に低下しなくなる。最後の攻撃を行った後、このクリーチャーは即座に死亡する。 この効果は、現在の傷の2倍以上のダメージを単発で受けた場合には発動しない。
この生物の傷が最大の傷の5%を下回ると、即座に追加ターンを付与され、その最後のアタッカーに向かって走り、攻撃する。その追加ターンの間、この生物は機会攻撃を無視し、敏捷性、腕力、武器スキルが著しく上昇し、すべてのマイナス効果が取り除かれ、傷が0に低下しなくなる。最後の攻撃を行った後、この生物は即座に死亡する。

languages.text: Bu yaratık, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %5'inin altına indiğinde anında bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazanır ve kendisine en son saldırana doğru koşarak ona saldırır. Yaratık, bu ek turda {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} yok sayar. {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} nitelikleri önemli ölçüde artar. Üzerindeki tüm {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}olumsuz etkiler{/g} ortadan kalkar ve sağlık puanı 0'a düşemez. Yaratık, bu nihai saldırısını gerçekleştirir gerçekleştirmez ölür. Yaratık, mevcut sağlık puanının en az iki katına eşit miktarda tek bir hasar silsilesi alırsa bu etki tetiklenmez.
languages.original_text: Once this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 5% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, it immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, runs to its last attacker, and attacks them. During that extra turn, this creature ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} are significantly increased, all {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are removed from it, and its wounds cannot be reduced to 0. After performing this final attack, the creature immediately dies. This effect is not triggered if the creature takes a single instance of damage equal to or more than twice its current wounds.

traits.locale_text: Bu yaratık, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %5'inin altına indiğinde anında bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazanır ve kendisine en son saldırana doğru koşarak ona saldırır. Yaratık, bu ek {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} yok sayar. {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} nitelikleri önemli ölçüde artar. Üzerindeki tüm {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}olumsuz etkiler{/g} ortadan kalkar ve sağlık puanı 0'a düşemez. Yaratık, bu nihai saldırısını gerçekleştirir gerçekleştirmez ölür. Yaratık, mevcut sağlık puanının en az iki katına eşit miktarda tek bir hasar silsilesi alırsa bu etki tetiklenmez.

Bu yaratık, sağlık puanı %5'in altına indiğinde anında bir ek tur kazanır ve kendisine en son saldırana doğru koşarak ona saldırır. Yaratık, bu ek turda fırsat saldırılarını yok sayar. Çeviklik, Kuvvet ve Silah Yeteneği nitelikleri önemli ölçüde artar. Üzerindeki tüm olumsuz etkiler ortadan kalkar ve sağlık puanı 0'a düşemez. Yaratık, bu nihai saldırısını gerçekleştirir gerçekleştirmez ölür.
